author: MSNBC
title: Arizona Starbucks becomes first outside New York to unionize
description: Employees at a Starbucks in suburban Phoenix voted Friday to form a union, becoming the first store outside New York to organize.
content:
MESA, Ariz. Employees at a Starbucks in suburban Phoenix voted Friday to form a union, becoming the first store outside New York to organize.
Several workers from a Mesa Starbucks store cheered and â€¦ [+3108 chars]
